title: 1000 minutes monthly
info: 1000 call minutes for 30 days at the price of 180 Afghanis. To activate, dial *233*9*1# and to deactivate *233*9*2#.

title: 1500 monthly minutes
info: 1500  call minutes for 30 days at the price of 300 Afghanis. To activate, dial *233*4*1# and to deactivate *233*4*2#.

title: 5100 minutes per month
info: 5100 call minutes for 30 days to  The price is 499 Afghanis. To activate, dial *233*2*1# and for deactivation, dial *233*2*2#.
